de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.init

Interface IDataStoreInit

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataStoreInit

    public interface IDataStoreInit
    Implementations of IDataStoreInit are used to initialize an IDataStore by defined DataStoreSettings

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initDataStore(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx, DataStoreSettings settings, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<IDataStore>> handler)
      Initialize a new instance if IDataStore with the definintions inside the DataStoreSettings

    • Method Detail

      • initDataStore

        void initDataStore(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx,
                   DataStoreSettings settings,
                   io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<IDataStore>> handler)
        Initialize a new instance if IDataStore with the definintions inside the DataStoreSettings
        Parameters:
        vertx - the instance of vertx to be used
        settings - the settings to be used for init
        handler - the handler to be informed about the created IDataStore
